itemDescription: English fell runner and convicted attempted murderer

wikipedia_page.main: Lauren Jeska (born 5 September 1974) is a British former fell runner from Lancaster. Jeska, a trans woman, was convicted of the attempted murder of Ralph Knibbs, HR manager for UK Athletics after Knibbs investigated Jeska's eligibility to compete as a woman.

response: *1974 – Lauren Jeska, British transgender fell runner convicted of the attempted murder of Ralph Knibbs

*Lauren Jeska (born 1974) – a transgender athlete, was convicted of the attempted murder of an official, Ralph Knibbs.Fell-runner admits attempted knife murder of British athletics official |Lancashire Evening Post .
|Lauren Jeska
|Fell-runner Lauren Jeska tried to kill British athletics official because she feared the body would revoke her titles over transgender status
* Lauren Jeska, transgender fell runner convicted of the attempted murder of Ralph Knibbs

On 22 March 2016 fell-runner Lauren Jeska from Lancaster attacked UK Athletics official Ralph Knibbs at the stadium, stabbing him multiple times. Jeska had feared her records in women's events would be quashed due to transphobia. She later pleaded guilty to attempted murder and was sentenced to 18 years imprisonment.Lauren Jeska jailed for Alexander Stadium stabbings - BBC NewsFell-runner Lauren Jeska tried to kill British athletics official because she feared the body would revoke her titles over transgender status
* Lauren Jeska (born 1974), British transgender athlete convicted of attempted murder

*Lauren Jeska, transgender fell-runner convicted of the attempted murder of Ralph Knibbs
* Lauren Jeska – transgender fell runner from Lancaster convicted of the attempted murder of Ralph Knibbs

On 22 March 2016 Knibbs was a victim of attempted murder by transgender fell runner Lauren Jeska. Knibbs was stabbed several times in the head and neck by Jeska in a ""premeditated and savage attack" resulting in life threatening injuries and Knibbs suffering a stroke. The attack occurred in the context of a planned review of Jeska's status as a female athlete because of the fact she had been born a man. Jeska admitted attempted murder and was jailed for 18 years.
* Lauren Jeska, fell running

*22 March – Transgender fell-runner Lauren Jeska attempts to murder UK Athletics official Ralph Knibbs, stabbing him multiple times in Birmingham. Jeska had feared her records and ability to compete in women's events would be investigated due to the unfair advantage she had from being born male.Fell-runner Lauren Jeska tried to kill British athletics official because she feared the body would revoke her titles over transgender status
